item.title: Xerox to Buy Printer Maker Lexmark From Chinese Owners
item.description: The deal would value closely held Lexmark at $1.5 billion, including debt.

item.title: Euro Could Hit Parity Against Dollar But Not for Long
item.description: The euro was down against the dollar and could weaken to parity in the first quarter of 2025, but would be unlikely to remain at this level for long, ...

item.title: Base Metals Edge Higher Despite Strong Dollar
item.description: Base metals edged higher despite a strong dollar, after the latest U.S. inflation print alleviated concerns over Fed interest-rate cuts next year.

item.title: Oil Edges Higher After U.S. Inflation Data But Demand Concerns Persist
